thread.section_title: Travel News, Tips, and Guides - USATODAY.com
thread.title: Yelp's hidden gems: North Conway, N.H.
thread.title_full: Yelp's hidden gems: North Conway, N.H.

title: Yelp's hidden gems: North Conway, N.H.
persons: Dara R. Yelp Fullscreen May Kelly
text:
Diana's Baths: http://www.yelp.com/biz/dianas-baths-north-conway Photo: Harald C. More reader comments: "I could have easily spent the whole day here. Gorgeous falls with big rocks to lounge on and dip your toes into deliciously cold mountain water." - Cookie T. Yelp Fullscreen Eastern Mountain Sports Climbing School: http://www.yelp.com/biz/eastern-mountain-sports-climbing-school-north-conway-2 Photo: "This is the awesome Ann preparing my leash for the Lion Head trail chutes." - L H. More reader comments: "The quality of the guides make or break the trip. Ours (Cheyenne and Rob) were absolutely incredible. Constantly encouraging, informative, friendly, competent, and completely focused on our safety." - Paul H. Yelp Fullscreen Cranmore Mountain Resort: http://www.yelp.com/biz/cranmore-mountain-resort-north-conway 4 Photo: "Having fun." - Michael R. More reader comments: "This was an amazing experience for people of all ages. The ropes course and zip lines were my favorite! We have a teen and a pre-teen and this was perfect they enjoyed every minute of it!" - Charlene G. Yelp Fullscreen Northern Extremes: http://www.yelp.com/biz/northern-extremes-conway Photo: "Kayak" - Michael E. More reader comments: "$20 buys you a tube for the day, a map, and a shuttle ride to the drop off point and back to the car, plus four fabulous hours of river time-- a pretty sweet deal." - Dessa R. Yelp Fullscreen Lower Falls: http://www.yelp.com/biz/lower-falls-conway Photo: "late afternoon, Oct 9." - Lana B. More reader comments: "We went in early June when it was sunny and beautiful outside with a slight chill in the air - It was easy to navigate the rocks and climb out into the middle of the river. A few people had stopped to take in the view as well. Excellent spot to take in the white mountains and catch a few neat photo opportunities on the river." - Shannon S. Yelp Fullscreen Moat Mountain Smokehouse & Brewing: http://www.yelp.com/biz/moat-mountain-smokehouse-and-brewing-north-conway Photo: "Pulled pork Carolina style" - Max C. More reader comments: "I generally itch when I stray too far from the city, but I often get a hankering to head northeast -- WAY NORTHEAST, down winding country roads (yeah, they may be numbered with route markers but if there's trees and deer, it's country to me) to have some of the best BBQ and beer in New England." - Heath M. Yelp Fullscreen Peach's: http://www.yelp.com/biz/peachs-north-conway Photo: "Stuffed French toast!" - Amy D. More reader comments: "If you are from out of town and you don't have any friends to host you for a good breakfast, go to PEACH's. Here, you can eat the best crochet monsieur which is made with Challah French toasted bread, yum." - Lena L. Yelp Fullscreen Flatbread Company: http://www.yelp.com/biz/flatbread-company-north-conway Photo: "Veggie special with kalamata olives on the side. SO YUMMY!" - Sarah K. More reader comments: "I wish I could give them 6 stars!! Popped in for lunch on a whim & ended up going back the same day for dinner because we loved it that much!! The atmosphere is great, laid-back, comfortable - the space is huge but somehow feels cozy. They source their ingredients locally & use mostly organic ingredients & hormone & antibiotic-free chicken & meats." - Lady J. Yelp Fullscreen Stairway Cafe: http://www.yelp.com/biz/stairway-cafe-north-conway Photo: "View from seat out on shaded porch" - Leli N. More reader comments: "Quite possibly the cutest place in the world! I'm a local and native of North Conway and this is my absolute favorite spot for breakfast, they have excellent lunch as well!" - Amelia C. Yelp Fullscreen White Mountain Cider Co.: http://www.yelp.com/biz/white-mountain-cider-co-glen-2 Photo: "Steak! Lobster corn garnish yum!" - Jordan P. More reader comments: "There are only few times in life where a meal is so expertly crafted and planes that it is nothing short of genius. The Chiefs at White Mountain Cider House have mastered the art of creating dishes with a unique twist that just leaves you wanting more." - Vidhi P. Yelp Fullscreen Frontside Grind Food: http://www.yelp.com/biz/frontside-grind-north-conway Photo: Laura D. More reader comments: "What a great coffee shop. Cool atmosphere, lots of exotic coffees and yummy treats. Stopped by for some caffeine and was blown away." - Dara R. Yelp Fullscreen May Kelly's: http://www.yelp.com/biz/may-kellys-north-conway Photo: "Great food Great bar Great staff!!!" - Amy D. More reader comments: "Being from Boston and Irish, I was pleasantly surprised by this place!! So great. The service, beer selection, bar and food were all awesome." - Erin C. Yelp Fullscreen Delaney's Hole in the Wall: http://www.yelp.com/biz/delaneys-hole-in-the-wall-north-conway-2 Photo: Kent W. More reader comments: "I don't know who, how, why someone decided to do a pub/sushi place but thanks be to sweet baby Jesus they did." - Adam D. Yelp Fullscreen McGrath's Tavern: http://www.yelp.com/biz/mcgraths-tavern-north-conway Photo: "The old sign on the walls, this place has history and character." - Jules N. More reader comments: "Not much to say except that this place is great! I love the atmosphere. Half is that of a classic "smoky" (no smoke, don't worry) bar, and the other half is that of a colonial inn." - Kevin G. Yelp Fullscreen Muddy Moose Restaurant & Pub: http://www.yelp.com/biz/muddy-moose-restaurant-and-pub-north-conway Photo: "This tall bar table was where we sat for our dinner." - Lena L. More reader comments: "Beer, antlers, snow, and inexpensive food! What more could you ask for on vacation in the NH mountains!" - Maura C. Yelp Fullscreen Zeb's General Store: http://www.yelp.com/biz/zebs-general-store-north-conway Photo: Katye M. More reader comments: "Going to Zeb's is an absolute must if you are in North Conway. It has the charm of a general store, but with so much merchandise you could spend a lot of time (and money) here." - Sarah C. Yelp Fullscreen North Conway Five Cent and Ten Cent Store: http://www.yelp.com/biz/north-conway-five-cent-and-ten-cent-store-north-conway Photo: HyunJoo K. More reader comments: "If you stop by here and have kids, be sure to grab a dollar grab bag. There are plenty of cute little things inside to amuse the little ones." - Alanna S. Yelp Fullscreen Mount Washington Observatory: http://www.yelp.com/biz/mount-washington-observatory-north-conway Photo: VIrginia L. More reader comments: "One of the most beautiful places I have been to. My friends and I took the auto route up to the summit. We were overtaken by the beauty of the mountains. When I was looking at all the scenery around me, I felt like at that moment the world was a huge place and with the beauty in front of me, I had a responsibility to keep that beauty for the next generation." - Phyllis L. Yelp Fullscreen Conway Scenic Railroad: http://www.yelp.com/biz/conway-scenic-railroad-north-conway-7 Photo: Monica B. More reader comments: "As always a great time! Have taken one of the train rides every summer for as long as I can remember. There is a train ride for just about everyone. From the Notch train which is 4-5 hours long with amazing views to the Conway train which is about an hour and a half and the Bartlett Train which is 1 3/4 hrs long." - Melanie G. Yelp Conway Scenic Railroad: http://www.yelp.com/biz/conway-scenic-railroad-north-conway-7 Photo: Monica B. More reader comments: "As always a great time! Have taken one of the train rides every summer for as long as I can remember. There is a train ride for just about everyone. From the Notch train which is 4-5 hours long with amazing views to the Conway train which is about an hour and a half and the Bartlett Train which is 1 3/4 hrs long." - Melanie G. (Photo: Yelp)
CONNECT 15 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE Just in time for fall foliage, Yelp unveils another of its hidden gems: North Conway, N.H. The reader review site ran a query of millions of user-generated records to find U.S. destinations that travelers may not be familiar with but had the points of interest — with stellar rankings from readers — that would draw them.
Browse the best local venues and businesses from Yelp readers in the slideshow above, and see below for our previous installment, Stillwater, Minn.
Trolley Tours Of Stillwater: www.yelp.com/biz/trolley-tours-of-stillwater-stillwater Photo: This trolley ride is awesome! You get to ride and enjoy the beautiful scenery of Stillwater, while learning some of the history of Stillwater, historical buildings and houses. It's breathtaking! - Yelper Risa Y Yelp Fullscreen Aamodt’s Apple Farm: www.yelp.com/biz/aamodts-apple-farm-stillwater Photo: Three dollar tractor rides by the vineyard. - Sarah H More reader comments: Picking apples is nice, but really, ignore the utilitarian value for a moment and realize that this is a place to JUST BE. Seriously, close your eyes and explore the apple scent and the wood scent with your sniffer. Go outside and do the same. Smell the leaves and feel the warm, dry, Minnesota fall sunshine on your neck. - Yelper Justin T Yelp Fullscreen St Croix Boat & Packet Co: www.yelp.com/biz/st-croix-boat-and-packet-co-stillwater-2 Photo: St Croix River Boat. - Bak J More reader comments: As I think back on the boat cruise what sticks out in my mind is how ALL of the staff were authentically welcoming, friendly and accommodating. The scenery, well, thank you Mother Nature! The St Croix River in the summer is a wonderfully relaxing way to kick back and enjoy an evening. - Yelper Kristi C Yelp Fullscreen Oasis Cafe: www.yelp.com/biz/oasis-cafe-stillwater Photo: This one is mine! Denver Haystack. :) - DeAnna J More reader comments: The menu is full of great, creative breakfast items. Unique to River Oasis is their haystackers, which is two eggs on top of a bed of hash browns and is loaded up with cheese and other ingredients depending on which haystackers you order. I ordered the Oasis haystacker which came with ham, bacon, sausage, green pepper, and mushrooms. I added their delicious sausage gravy which made the meal really come together. So many flavors!! We didn't have a long wait at all either. - Yelper Mike M Yelp Fullscreen Domacin: www.yelp.com/biz/domacin-stillwater Photo: Seared scallop. Delicious and cooked perfectly. - Eric J More reader comments: From the food, to the wine pairings, to the quaint atmosphere, to the warm and engaging service, this place really excels. You definitely feel like you've left the cities and you're in a small ocean front town. - Yelper Jason R Yelp Fullscreen Lolo American Kitchen: www.yelp.com/biz/lolo-american-kitchen-stillwater Photo: Pork belly tacos, loved them. Fresh greens were fabulous as well. - Matt B More reader comments: At first glance, we were confused. United Nations-style tacos! Burgers! And Parmesan tater tots! What the hell are those all doing on the same menu? But holy bejezus, when you execute as well as these folks do you could be serving waffles and baba ganoush for all I care. Get DOWN with your bad self and just COOK for me. - Yelper Leah O Yelp Fullscreen Mai Ly Asian Cuisine: www.yelp.com/biz/mai-ly-asian-cuisine-stillwater-2 Photo: Roast pork and meatballs noodles soup with egg noodles. - Adele S More reader comments: Excellent pho and noodle salads. Everything we tried was wonderful. The owner/chef served us and is very personable. - Yelper Kristen W Yelp Fullscreen Sweet Taste of Italy: www.yelp.com/biz/sweet-taste-of-italy-stillwater Photo: Uploaded by business. More reader comments: The absolute best part of our entire meal was the garlic bread! By far the best garlic bread I have ever eaten. An absolute must have with your meal. - Yelper Jeannie P Yelp Fullscreen Nacho Mama's: www.yelp.com/biz/nacho-mamas-stillwater Photo: Crispy Enchilada Stack. - Robyn H More reader comments: Grab a friend and head to Nacho Mama's for the largest meal you can imagine. Basket of chips and salsa: check. Oversized plate of the most delicious Mexican food: check. Margaritas in all flavors: check. Dessert even though you're stuffed: double check!!! - Yelper Breanne K Yelp Fullscreen Saint Croix Vineyards: www.yelp.com/biz/saint-croix-vineyards-stillwater Photo - Katherine M of Yelp More reader comments: The Vineyard features a tasting bar, small shop where you can purchase wine & wine themed gifts & attire :) The Vineyard also features a wine club that provides great deals & discounts to their subscribers. - Yelper Emily O Yelp Fullscreen Lift Bridge Brewing Company: www.yelp.com/biz/lift-bridge-brewing-company-stillwater Photo: 6oz Flights are an awesome way to kick off the tour! Kimberly F More reader comments: Great tour. Seriously! The tour was free and lasted maybe 1 hour and 15 minutes. Instead of the old boring talk of "How does I make beer?" , the tour guide Dave? talked about the history of beer, how it was used as payment, how it was used as a meal source, etc. It was awesome! As the tour went on (and I say less of a tour and more of a talk, since the space is just a walkway) we got to sample 4 of their beers. - Yelper Sarah M Yelp Fullscreen Maple Island Brewing: yelp.com/biz/maple-island-brewing-stillwater Photo: Beer flight. - Tetiana I More reader comments: Unlimited free popcorn, which I'm always a fan of, and the beer prices were extremely reasonable. $5 for a glass and $10 for a flight. My group all got flights and it was fun to try them all and the same time and talk about which ones we liked and why. - Yelper Erin D Yelp Fullscreen The Wedge & Wheel: www.yelp.com/biz/the-wedge-and-wheel-stillwater Photo: Amazing Cheese! - William R More reader comments: This is a friendly, local shop that features a small but thoughtfully curated selection of cheeses. Their real strength is finding domestic and really local cheeses that rival some of the great-grand-daddy cheeses from Europe. - Yelper Patti I Yelp Fullscreen Rose Mille: www.yelp.com/biz/rose-mille-stillwater Photo: In love with this pink couch. - Rodelle B More reader comments: They have stationery in the back with hundreds of ribbons, trimmings, and adornments to make all your packages as pretty as this shop. - Yelper Rodelle B Yelp Fullscreen Darn Knit Anyway: www.yelp.com/biz/darn-knit-anyway-stillwater Photo: Storefront. Love the name! - Lan F More reader comments: As far as selection, they have great brands and some that I haven't seen before but liked. They also carry a selection of fabric in the back so if you sew or want/need a lining or a border, there are some cute ones back there. - Yelper Breena E Yelp Fullscreen Ultima Bellezza Salon: www.yelp.com/biz/ultima-bellezza-salon-stillwater Photo - Amy L More reader comments: I cannot say enough good things about this salon. Such a wonderful environment with warm colors on the walls, comfy furniture, decorated so tastefully. Feels more like home than a salon. - Yelper Tina S Yelp Fullscreen Nelson's Drive In Dairy Store: www.yelp.com/biz/nelsons-drive-inn-dairy-store-stillwater-2 Photo: Single scoop of cookies & cream ice cream. - Jana H More reader comments: THIS PLACE IS AMAZING! Seriously. You have a gazillion flavors to choose from (that's a slight exaggeration, maybe only thirty), and you get SO MUCH ice cream for so little money. - Yelper Arazue F Yelp Fullscreen Gondola Romantica: www.yelp.com/biz/gondola-romantica-stillwater Photo: For when you really want to say, "I love you!" - John K More reader comments: If you are looking for a nice romantic night with your love ones, or special occasion to celebrate and out of ordinary outing. Then this one is definetely for the romantic side of you. - Yelper Tristan C Yelp Read or Share this story: http://usat.ly/1KzI8TG TOP VIDEOS
